title: Baroque period
text: The baroque was the poatic period of music time.
It was between the early 17th century until the 1750s.
In the territories of the Spanish and Portuguese empires
including the Iberian Peninsula it continued,
until the first decade of the 19th century.
deep colour, grandeur, and surprise to achieve a sense of awe.
Its bring us one of the most important musician of  all times!
